thread.title: Stars join forces with activists on BAFTA awards red carpet

title: Stars join forces with activists on BAFTA awards red carpet
text:
Stars join forces with activists on BAFTA awards red carpet Sunday, February 18, 2018 - 01:55 
Actors including Andrea Riseborough and Gemma Arterton were accompanied by activists at the event. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
